title: Executive Order 5571-Withdrawal of Public Lands for Resurvey, Arizona
content: Under authority contained in the act of June 25, 1910 (36 Stat. 847), as amended by the act of August 24, 1912 (37 Stat. 497), and subject to the conditions, provisions, and limitations of said acts, it is hereby ordered that the public lands in T. 1 S., R. 2 W., T. 3 S., R. 4 W., and T. 2 N., R. 4 W., Gila and Salt River meridian, Arizona, be, ;  and the same are hereby, withdrawn from settlement, location, sale, entry, and all forms of appropriation, pending a resurvey of said townships under the act of March 3, 1909 (35 Stat. 845).
This order shall continue in full force and effect unless and until revoked by the President, or by an act of Congress.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5571-Withdrawal of Public Lands for Resurvey, Arizona Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361198
